testcase.name: Successfully register with valid details and logout
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Homepage...................................................passed When User navigates to register page and enters valid details and clicks on register button.passed Then User is registered.....................................................passed

testcase.name: Add and Compare two products in comparison page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Homepage...................................................passed When User clicks on compare button on 2 products and navigates to compare page.passed Then User can Compare products..............................................passed

testcase.name: Edit User account details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Homepage...................................................passed When User clicks on my account button and edits details and clicks save button.passed Then User details are saved.................................................passed
